title: Hour 1: Crossover Special
description:
It's the First take and Get Up crossover special. Mike Greenberg says the Cowboys are headed to the Super Bowl following their loss to the Cowboys. Stephen A. says Josh Allen deserves more credit for the Bills win over the Chiefs. Dan Orlovsky calls the Green Bay Packers "soft." Rex Ryan calls Daniel Jones a special talent.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Stephen A. Smith, Molly Qerim Rose
